column5: Welcome to your new job at Cosmic Corp. We're known for creating the Planetary Operating Environment (POE for short). It's your job to make sure that all of your clients planets are taken care of. We've provided a folder filled with Modifier Documents to help you with this. Drag the correct files into the folders and you're all set! Any unauthorized modifiers are prohibited due to employees traveling to sites that contained malware that damaged planets. Planet Needs can be viewed from the stats document inside all planet folders. Get as many satisfaction points as possible by the end of the work day. Failure to collect enough Satisfaction Points will result in disciplinary action.

Hey there mate! How are you doing on this new exciting job? If you are enjoying it make sure to rate us and give feedback so we can improve our work environment. Only half a day to go, good luck and have fun!
We have suspicions that you may be downloading unapproved modifiers. Disciplinary action or immediate termination will occur if discovered.

An employee has raised a complaint due to your work. This information will be investigated and we remind you that downloading unapproved modifiers will result in disciplinary action or immediate termination.
